required_steps: Fill in the amount, date, category, and description.

tasks.description: View a summary of monthly spending by category.
required_steps: Select the desired month and year from the filters.
Review the spending breakdown chart or table.

tasks.description: Update the budget for a specific category.
Generate a financial report for a date range.
required_steps: Select a start date and end date.
Choose the report type (e.g., Income vs. Expenses).
Click 'Generate Report' and review the results.

pages.name: Dashboard
pages.description: Overview page displaying key financial metrics, recent transactions, and a summary chart of income vs. expenses for the current month.

pages.name: Transactions
pages.description: Page to view, add, edit, and delete all financial transactions. Includes filtering and sorting capabilities.

pages.name: Budget
pages.description: Page to set, view, and manage monthly budgets for different spending categories.

pages.name: Reports
pages.description: Page to generate and view detailed financial reports for custom date ranges, including visual charts and export options.

pages.name: Categories
pages.description: Page to manage the list of categories and tags used for categorizing transactions.

task_instruction: Track and analyze personal income and expenses to manage financial health.
